weather.question: I fall from the sky, but I'm not rain. I'm cold and white, and kids love to play in me! What am I?

hints.text: ❄️ I am made of tiny ice crystals.
🧤 You might need gloves to play with me.
⛄ You can build a snowman with me.

weather.question: I come after rain when the sun shines through. I have many colors, like a painted view. What am I?

hints.text: 🌈 I am an arc in the sky.
☀️ I need both sun and rain to exist.
🧪 My colors are like the colors of the rainbow.

weather.question: I am a big, white, fluffy thing that floats in the sky. Sometimes I bring rain, and sometimes I just drift by. What am I?

hints.text: 🐑 I can look like different animals.
💧 I am made of tiny water droplets.
✈️ Airplanes fly through me.

weather.question: I am hot and yellow, and I give you light. Plants need me to grow, from morning till night. What am I?

hints.text: 🌞 I am a star.
😎 You might need sunglasses when I am out.
🌡️ I make the temperature warm.

weather.question: I am strong and noisy, and I can knock down trees. I spin around and around, bringing leaves to your knees. What am I?

hints.text: 💨 I am moving air.
🪁 You can fly a kite in me.
🍃 I can be gentle or very powerful.

weather.question: I am water that falls from the sky. I help plants grow and you don't want to be without me... unless you have an umbrella! What am I?

hints.text: ☔ You need protection from me.
💧 Puddles are formed by me.
🌱 Plants need me to live.

weather.question: I am a loud crash in the sky, followed by a flash of light. I often come with storms, both day and night. What am I?

hints.text: ⚡ I am electricity in the sky.
⛈️ Thunder usually follows me.
🌳 Staying inside is safest when I appear.

weather.question: I am a swirling storm at sea, with powerful winds that blow. I have an 'eye' in the middle, a dangerous place to go. What am I?

hints.text: 🌀 I am a type of tropical cyclone.
🌊 I cause big waves and flooding.
📍 People track my path to stay safe.

weather.question: I am a cold and snowy storm, with strong winds that bite. I can make it hard to see, both day and night. What am I?

hints.text: 🥶 I cause snowdrifts.
🧣 You need to dress warmly when I happen.
🚗 Traveling is dangerous during me.

weather.question: I am a spinning column of air, that touches the ground from a stormy sky. I can cause a lot of damage if I pass you by. What am I?

hints.text: 🌪️ I am a type of vortex.
🏘️ You should seek shelter underground if one is near.
🌽 I am often seen in flat, open areas.

food.question: I am orange and crunchy. Rabbits love to eat me. What am I?

hints.text: 🥕 I grow in the ground.
👁️ You need me to help you see in the dark (not really!).
🐰 Bugs Bunny loves me!

food.question: I am yellow and you peel me before you eat me. Monkeys love me! What am I?

hints.text: 🌴 I grow on trees.
🥣 I can be used in smoothies.
🐒 A famous cartoon monkey loves to peel me.

food.question: I am red and juicy, and I grow on trees. An apple a day keeps the doctor away! What am I?

hints.text: 🥧 You can make a pie with me.
🍎 Snow White bit into me.
📚 I was on the head of a scientist.

food.question: I am white and come from a cow. You can drink me with cookies. What am I?

hints.text: 🥛 Baby animals drink me.
🦴 I help you grow strong bones.
🐄 I come from an animal that says 'moo'.

food.question: I am a grain that's often eaten for breakfast. I can be puffed, flaked, or shredded. What am I?

hints.text: 🥣 You often eat me with milk.
🐯 I am advertised by Tony the Tiger.
🌱 I come from a field.

food.question: I am made of flour, water, and yeast. I am baked in an oven. You can make a sandwich with me. What am I?

hints.text: 🥪 I am a common item in lunches.
🍞 You can toast me.
🌾 I'm made from wheat.

food.question: I am round and can be many colors, like green, purple, or red. I grow on vines, and you can eat me as a snack or make juice from me. What am I?

hints.text: 🍇 I come in bunches.
🍷 An adult drink is made from me, but kids shouldn't have it.
🦸 There is a popular kid show starring Mickey Mouse where he eats a snack of me with a friend.

food.question: I am a long yellow fruit with a peel. I am full of potassium and come in a bunch, but I am not a banana. What am I?

hints.text: 💪 I am a good source of potassium and electrolytes.
🍌 I look like a banana but I am not.
🚫 I am NOT a banana.

food.question: I am a small, round vegetable that is often green. I grow in a pod and sometimes kids don't want to eat me. What am I?

hints.text: 🌱 I grow in a garden.
💪 I can help make you strong, like Popeye's favorite vegetable (but not spinach!).
🚫 Some people think I taste like dirt.

food.question: I am a large, round fruit with a thick green rind. I am red and juicy inside, with black seeds. I am very refreshing in the summer. What am I?

hints.text: 🍉 My juice can be very messy!
⛱️ I am great to eat at a picnic.
🌱 I grow on vines close to the ground.
